about_the_game:
Step into the shoes of a modern-day nomad, exploring the vast and varied landscapes the world has to offer, all from the comfort of your custom-built van.

Customization and Preparation:

Start your adventure by choosing and customizing your vehicle. Will you go for a compact and agile van for easier maneuverability or a larger RV for extra comfort and amenities? Equip your van with essential gear, from solar panels and kitchenettes to cozy sleeping areas and storage for all your adventure gear. Choose your decor and make your van a true home on wheels.

Exploration and Adventure:

With your van ready, hit the road and set your course. Navigate through detailed maps featuring real-world locations, from the majestic peaks of the Rocky Mountains to the serene beaches of the Pacific Coast. Each destination offers unique challenges and opportunities: find the perfect spot to camp, gather resources, and explore your surroundings. Experience dynamic weather systems and seasons that affect your travel and camping experience.

Survival and Management:

Living the van life isn't just about relaxation; it's also about survival and resource management. Monitor your fuel, food, water, and electricity to keep your journey smooth. Use your skills to repair and maintain your van, cook meals, and ensure you're prepared for whatever the road throws your way.

Relaxation and Activities:

When it's time to unwind, enjoy activities like fishing, photography, hiking, or simply watching the sunset from your campsite. Customize your itinerary to include visits to landmarks or discover hidden gems off the beaten path.

VanLife Camping Simulator offers a rich, open-world experience that combines the freedom of exploration with the nuances of van life and camping. Whether you're fulfilling a long-held dream of road-tripping across the country or simply escaping into the tranquility of nature, this game provides a unique and engaging adventure that celebrates the spirit of adventure and the joy of discovering the unknown. Ready to start your engine and embrace the van life?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP and up
  • Processor: 64bit CPU, 1 Ghz and up
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

short_description: Embark on a road trip adventure. Design, customize, and drive your dream van across breathtaking landscapes. Experience the freedom of van life as you choose your path, from serene national parks to bustling city campsites. Manage resources, tackle challenges, and create memories under the stars.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Vietnamese
